title: Land for sale in Nittambuwa town 95 perches
details:
• Land located close to Negombo South International School and 50m to Nittabuwa Town.
• Water and three-phase electricity.
• Perfect residential area & Commercial Land
• 5 minutes to Nittabuwa town .
• Clear deeds.
Nittambuwa Land (Nittambuwa Junction 50m in Veyangoda Road)
50m From Colombo - Kandy Road,
Close to Sangabodhi College
Price can be negotiating only after Inspection

50m කොළඹ සිට නුවර පාර,
සංගබෝධි විද්යාලයට ආසන්නව
මිල ගණන් සාකච්ඡා කළ හැක්කේ පරීක්ෂණයෙන් පසුව පමණි.

Don’t miss this valuable investment opportunity in rapidly developing area in Gampaha District.
